name: Commercial Test (SecureHost)
query: SELECT * FROM STREAM WHERE Environment = 'Commercial.Test.SecureHost' AND @Level = 'Error'

name: Commercial Train (SecureHost)
query: SELECT * FROM STREAM WHERE Environment = 'Commercial.Train.SecureHost' AND @Level = 'Error'

name: Commercial DevTest2 (SecureHost)
query: SELECT * FROM STREAM WHERE Environment = 'Commercial.DevTest2.SecureHost' AND @Level = 'Error'

name: Commercial Dev2 (SecureHost)
query: SELECT * FROM STREAM WHERE Environment = 'Commercial.Dev2.SecureHost' AND @Level = 'Error'
